website_summaries.verdict: Made of organic cotton and fragranced with organic essential oils, these natural wipes have a refreshing scent and are beautifully thick and soft.
pros: Certified organic cotton construction is thick, plush, and 100% biodegradable
Enriched with soothing chamomile, linden, and apricot essential oils
Doesn’t leave lint stuck to skin
cons: If you have a sensitive nose, the scent might be too strong

customer_reviews.title: These are our favorite wipes. They don't leave lint
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite wipes. They don't leave lint, don't have a strong smell, don't tear easily and are cotton based.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great way to wash up for the disabled.
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell and super strong! I use to wash hands when Im far from a sink.
customer_reviews.author: Annony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipe!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and gentle. They have a smell to them, but it's mild. I used them on my preemie twins with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: ChCT

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, smells great
customer_reviews.text: The Linden flower extract makes these smell like lime, it's really nice. They are so gentle too, very soothing for my newborn. Natracare makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: KTp

customer_reviews.title: Organic, Soft and Pleasantly Fragrant!
customer_reviews.text: Soft texture, really nice fragrance, never too dry or overly wet -- it's the perfect, organic baby wipe! I wouldn't buy any other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. Minimal scent, gentle on my babies bum. I love the bulk option as well, definitely go through baby wipes!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Organic and healthy!!
customer_reviews.text: Why aren't there more organic options in the world of baby care? This is the only organic baby wipe I can find, and I have to say I'm incredibly pleased with them. My only complaint is that there are only 50 wipes in one packet. We go through them like crazy! Seriously, take the time to look at the ingredient list and to educate yourself about other baby wipes and their ingredients. It's scary what they put in non-organic wipes. It's important that we introduce the safest possible products to our baby's sensitive skin - these are the best option around, hands down. We don't trust any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was allergic to EVERY SINGLE NATURAL WIPE except this one. It’s expensive, no doubt, but it’s worth it. The wipes are strong and soft, they work well even on tough diaper messes, and the scent is awesome (not floral, not artificial). Best of all, they work well for kiddos who have allergies or get rashes easily. There’s never too little liquid, either. Nor have I had a wipe disintegrate on me. The best wipes around, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Else

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... used the other organic brand and when they dried out allot of fibers, but this one.. not!! Yes, it is pricey, however for what you are getting.. it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda William Sarman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and very thick. It does the job. Personally, I like the smell of these.
customer_reviews.author: Meser

product_meta.title: Natracare Organic Cotton Baby Wipes, 50 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:50 Count

Soft and gentle Organic Baby Wipes for daily use on your little one’s delicate skin. We use an organic cotton cloth infused with organic essential oils of chamomile, apricot and sweet almond oil. All of which cleanse and refresh, leaving skin clean and soft.

The gentle formula is free from detergents such as sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS) or any of its close relatives. No parabens or synthetic preservatives, including methylisothiazolinone (MIT) and other types of formaldehyde releasing preservatives.

Certified by The Soil Association.
feature_bullets: No Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), Parabens or MIT

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
